author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-1041. java: TDeserializer holds onto a reference of the array it reads after it is done deserializing
This patch makes sure that after using the bytes passed in, no references are retained.

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-998. java: Using valueOf for base types in getFieldValue
valueOf saves us on memory for 'small' primitive types and costs us nothing in other situations, so it's an all-around win.
